name: Adventurer's mission
description:
The Adventurer's mission is a TTRPG that fits in your wallet! With a busness card size you can carry it whenever your go out! All you need to play is this card and a coin.

Create a Adventurer and give they a name, an mission and two specializations. They will try to complete their mission, but Challenges awaits in their path.

Overcome the Challenges and come out a greater adventurer in this simple system!

For a easier time reading on a Smartphone you can download the Adventurers mission smartphone.pdf

This game was made for the Pleasure-not-business Card RPG Jam.
